title: Qlick Gaming main roster Support position available.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello All,

Qlick Gaming is looking for a dedicated Support player for our main roster. As well as players of all positions for substitute roles.

We are currently competing in Riots OOL.

The player's must meet a few requirements;
- Diamond 5+
- OCE Based
- Serious intentions of Making the OPL
- Willing to put in the time to practice and scrim.

We are looking to make a serious mark in the competitive community in OCE and with your help we will be able to do just that.
If you're interested or know someone who would be you can contact us through the following;
- Email us at management@qlickgaming.com
- Add "erthlang" or "Pope Francis" in client
- Contact us on twitter, @qlickgaming

Bearabouts
Community Manager
Qlick Gaming
